item.title: AAC - US1 - Designer Cloud Job Creation Issue
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Major Issue with Job Creations in Alteryx Cloud US Region

We have identified an issue with job creations in the us1.alteryxcloud.com region, and are rolling out fixes to US, EU, and AU. As of now, US1 should function normally. We have rolled out a fix to this issue to all production regions and will continue to monitor to ensure the issue is fully resolved.

Feb 29, 20:46 UTC
Monitoring - We have rolled out a fix to this issue to all production regions, and will continue to monitor to ensure the issue is fully resolved.

Feb 29, 20:43 UTC
Identified - We have identified the issue, and are rolling out fixes to US, EU, and AU
As of now, US1 should function normally

Feb 29, 20:41 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Feb 29, 20:00 UTC
Investigating - We have identified an issue with job creations in us1.alteryxcloud.com, against Designer Cloud. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause, rest assured we are working to resolve this issue as soon as possible.

item.title: Auto Insights Data Ingestion Issue (datasets via CSV, DB, and Designer Uploader, all AACP Regions)
item.content:encoded:
Dec 22, 07:08 UTC
Resolved - Marking this incident as resolved as we are able to support >500MB datasets.

Dec 22, 07:01 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented to allow "small-medium" datasets to be ingested to Auto Insights (~500MB). Work is continuing to remove this limitation and support larger datasets.

Dec 21, 23:40 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Dec 21, 22:17 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue that is impacting the ingestion of datasets into Auto Insights across our AACP US, AU and EU environments.

item.title: Auto Insights Data Ingestion Issue (datasets via CSV and Designer Uploader, all AACP Regions)
item.content:encoded:
Dec 4, 18:17 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 4, 16:12 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented to resolve this issue, we are continuing to monitor the results.

Dec 1, 01:45 UTC
Update - This issue does not impact data ingestion via DB Connections, which still supports large datasets.
We are continuing to validate the resolution to this issue for CSV and Designer Uploader ingestion methods.

Nov 30, 04:02 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Nov 29, 21:53 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue that is impacting the ingestion of large datasets (more than a few hundred MB) into Auto Insights across our AACP US, AU and EU environments.

item.title: Auto Insights (AACP US region only) Data Ingestion Issue
item.content:encoded:
Oct 9, 03:34 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 9, 02:18 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been deployed to resolve this issue and our team are monitoring the status.

Oct 9, 01:17 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an issue with Data Ingestion for Auto Insights on our Alteryx Analytics Cloud (AACP) US instance, affecting all dataset uploads to Auto Insights including DB refreshes. Our team has identified the issue and are actively working on a resolution.
This issue only affects the US region, and does not impact AACP AU or EU environments.

item.title: Reporting Service Outage
item.content:encoded:
Aug 23, 20:32 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 23, 20:24 UTC
Update - The fix has been applied and confirmed issue is resolved.

Aug 12, 02:24 UTC
Monitoring - Our Engineering team has applied a fix and the Reporting service functionality has been restored. Some customers may experience degraded functionality to the Reporting service. We will provide an update once these issues have been fully resolved.

Aug 11, 23:32 UTC
Identified - At this time our Engineering teams have identified the cause of the issue, and a fix is in development. We will continue to provide updates as they become available.

Aug 11, 19:25 UTC
Investigating - There is currently an issue with the reporting service in Alteryx Analytics Cloud. The Engineering teams are actively engaged in identifying and resolving the issue. We will provide updates as they become available.

item.content:encoded:

Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Aug 23, 14:50 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Aug 23, 14:22 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Aug 23, 14:21 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Aug 23, 14:05 UTC
Update - This issue was internally detected, but it appears to be isolated to Alteryx accounts, customers do not appear to be impacted at this time. We are continuing to investigate and remediate the issue

Aug 23, 13:22 UTC
Investigating - We are aware of an issue where some of users are not able to log in into Alteryx Analytics Cloud. We will continue updating this incident as we have additional details.

item.title: The Designer Cloud is currently not available due to technical difficulties
item.content:encoded:
Jul 20, 10:49 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jul 20, 10:18 UTC
Monitoring - We identified an issue, implemented fix and Designer Cloud is available

Jul 20, 10:02 UTC
Investigating - We would like to inform you that we are currently experiencing technical difficulties with Designer Cloud. Our team is fully engaged in diagnosing and rectifying the problem and we will post updates soon
